content.query:
-- File FORMAT

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
		FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			FIRST_ROW = 2,
			USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
		))

-- Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [divy-storage_divydatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'abfss://divy-storage@divydatalake.dfs.core.windows.net', 
	TYPE = HADOOP 
)

-- External Table Statement


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test.divyam_tbl (
	[database] nvarchar(4000),
	[table] nvarchar(4000),
	[base_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[create] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'project_files/airtable_data_config.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [divy-storage_divydatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test.divyam_tbl_1 (
	ID NVARCHAR(4000),
	LAST_DATE NVARCHAR(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'project_files/sql_file_18.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [divy-storage_divydatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)

SELECT *
FROM test.divyam_tbl_1
where [database] = 'spain_development'
GO
